raw_answer: 解:过点A作AH⊥BC于点H,连接OC,OD,∵AB=AC,∴AH=CH,∴AH过点O,∵DE是⊙O的切线,∴OD⊥DE,∵DE⊥BC,∴∠OHE=∠E=∠EDO=90°,∴四边形ODEH是矩形,∴∠AOD=90°,∵AD=2√{2},∴OA=OD=2,∵∠BAC=45°,∴∠COH=45°,∵OC=2,∴OH=CH=√{2},∴DE=OH=√{2}．故选:D．
